downloadTitle: Sign in to Start Using Your New Microsoft Services
downloadDescription: If you are already using some Microsoft services from a paid or trial subscription, then you already have a Microsoft services account. This guide will describe how to sign in with your existing account.

downloadFile.name: Sign in to Start Using Your New Microsoft Services.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/a/1/d/a1d47837-ca1c-463d-a926-fd553057f481/Sign in to Start Using Your New Microsoft Services.pdf

detailsSection: If you are already using some Microsoft services from a paid or trial subscription, then you already have a Microsoft services account. This guide will describe how to sign in with your existing account.
detailsSection_file_name: Sign in to Start Using Your New Microsoft Services.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported Operating System 
Windows 10 , Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows Vista, Windows XP 
You must have Adobe Reader installed on your computer to view these files.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to open or save these files to your computer.
